casebody.data:
ARMSTRONG
v.
NORTH CAROLINA, et al. 41P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Arthur O. Armstrong, for Armstrong, Arthur O.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of June 2018 by Plaintiff for Leave to File a Writ of Mandamus:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
